price: Ima ljudi koji se bez ikakva znanja prepiru o Allahu i koji slijede svakog šejtana prkosnoga.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يُجَٰدِلُ فِي ٱللَّهِ بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖ وَيَتَّبِعُ كُلَّ شَيۡطَٰنٖ مَّرِيدٖ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamina al-nāsi man yujādilu fī al-lahi bighayri ʿil'min wayattabiʿu kulla shayṭānin marīdin
